paragraphs.body: I would like to propose a much stricter punishment system for users who edit with the clear intention of 'earning' badges. If you happen to earn badges through normal editing, and actual betterment of the wiki, there is clearly nothing wrong with that. But when it starts getting obnoxious, then I believe that something should be done. Does anyone else agree? --I'm The Bos - Talk - Guardian 22:04, September 5, 2010 (UTC)
